title: Full ARURF+ Change List
body:
Hey everyone,

We've made a number of balance changes to ARURF+ both pre-launch and through micropatches in the last couple days. This thread will allow you to get the details on those changes.


**1/31**
Reduced Tower Damage bonus from Elder Dragon by half on first Elder Dragon

Dark Harvest
Reduced damage per soul from 5 to 2
Reduced base damage at level 1 from 20 to 15
Reduced base damage at level 18 from 60 to 55
Reduced AP Ratio from 0.15 to 0.1

Buffs:
Aatrox +10% Damage Reduction, +5% Damage Dealt (total +1+5% Damage Dealt +20% Damage Reduction)
Aurelion Sol +10% Damage Reduction, +5% Damage Dealt
Corki +10% Damage Dealt
Darius +10% Damage Reduction, +5% Damage Dealt
Gangplank +10% Damage Dealt
Illaoi +15% Damage Reduction, +5% Damage Dealt
Irelia +10% Damage Reduction, +5% Damage Dealt
Leona +10% Damage Reduction, +5% Damage Dealt
Ornn +5% Damage Reduction, (total 25%)
Rek'Sai +10% Damage Reduction (total 20%)
Sion +15% Damage Reduction
Sona - Damage from -10% to -5% (partial nerf rollback)
Tahm Kench +10% Damage Reduction, (total 20% Damage Reduction, 20% Damage Dealt)
Thresh +5% Damage Reduction, +5% Damage Dealt
Urgot +10% Damage Reduction, +5% Damage Dealt
Yasuo +5% Damage Reduction, +10% Damage Dealt
Zac 15% Damage Reduction
Zilean +10% Damage Dealt

**1/29**
Nerfs:
Malzahar -8% Damage Dealt
Sivir -5% Damage Dealt
Ahri -5% Damage Dealt
Kai'Sa -5% Damage Dealt
Xayah -5% Damage Dealt
Master Yi -5% Damage Reduction

Buff:
Braum 20% Damage Reduction, 10% Damage Dealt
Bard  10% Damage Reduction, 15% Damage Dealt
Rammus 10% Damage Reduction
Rek'Sai 10% Damage Reduction, 5% Damage Dealt
Gnar 10% Damage Reduction, 5% Damage Dealt
Tahm Kench 10% Damage Reduction
Wukong, Damage Dealt from -10% to -5%
Ryze Damage Dealt from -10% to 0%
Ornn Damage Reduction increased from 10% -> 20%

**Pre-Launch**
Nerfs:
Sona - HP 480 -> 460, HP Lvl 77 -> 50, Damage - 10%
Karthus - HP 528 -> 450, HP Lvl 87 -> 65, Damage -15%
Wukong - AD Lvl 4 -> 3, Base AD 68 -> 63, HP Lvl 85 -> 70, Damage - 10%
Rumble - HP Lvl 85 -> 65, HP 589 -> 550, Damage - 10%
Ryze - Damage - 10%
Jax - HP 592 -> 550, HP Lvl 85 -> 60
Fiora - HP Lvl 85 -> 60, AS Lvl 3.2 -> 2.5
Zed - HP 582 -> 550, HP Lvl 85 -> 60, Damage - 10%

Buffs:
Aatrox - Deals 10% more damage, Takes 10% less damage
Tahm Kench - MS 335 -> 340, HP 538 -> 600, HP/Lvl 102 -> 120, Damage +20%
Kalista - AD/lvl 3.6 -> 7, Damage +20%
Rek'Sai - Health 570->600, HPLvl 85->100, ADLvl 3.35->4.5, Arm 33->38, ASLvl 2->3
Katarina - HPlvl 92->105, MS 340->345
Ornn - Health 565->600, HPLvl 95-105, MS 335->340, Deals 10% more damage, Takes 10% less damage
Evelynn - MS 335->345, Damage +10%
Zac - HP/lvl 95->105, Arm 33->38, Arm/lvl 3.5->4.5. MRlvl 1.25->1.75

Early Surrender - When you end up in those truly hopeless games, you can now unanimously surrender at 8 minutes, or normal surrender at 10 minutes.
Early Homeguard - Homeguard is enabled from the start of the match.
Bonus Tower Damage - Rip down enemy structures a bit faster with our newest tweak to URF’s Awesome Buff of Awesomeness.
Removed Teleport - Since other things like homeguard and the cannon make map movement much easier, we’ve disabled teleport to help everyone focus on combat-oriented Summoner Spells.

Runes Balance for URF:
Dark Harvest
Cooldown 45->12
Electrocute
Cooldown 25->10
Predator
Cooldown 150->80
Cooldown Minimum 100->50
Ghost Poro
Cooldown 60->25
Taste of Blood
Cooldown 20->10

Klepto
Buffed probabilities commensurate with game speed increase
Magical Footwear
Boots granted at 6 minutes instead of 10 minutes
Biscuit Delivery
Biscuit Minute Interval 3min->1.5min
Minion Dematerializer
Initial Cooldown 4 minutes -> 2 minutes
Perfect Timing
Initial Cooldown 10 minutes -> 4 minutes

Presence of Mind
Ult CD Reduction 10%->6%

Aftershock
Cooldown 35->15
Grasp of the Undying
Triggered attack bonus health increased to 15 from 5.
Ranged champions triggered attack bonus health increased to 9 from 3.
Demolish
Cooldown 45->30
Conditioning
Begins at 6 minutes instead of 10 minutes

Phase Rush
Cooldown 15->10
Nimbus Cloak
Cooldown 60->30
Nullifying Orb
Cooldown 60->30
Gathering Storm
You get stats every 4.5 minutes instead of every 10 minutes

replies.body: I think that {{champion:120}}  needs some nerf at urf he is rly broken

ok riot listen, the balance changes are great - giving players a chance to not have to deal with the overpowered champions ruling the mode. But i think you’re missing the point, for many of us, the greatest fun in urf was getting someone like helicopter hecarim and beyblade garen, when the community found out the e stacked on each other, it was great. People raced into the mode to try and pull something rare to absolutely dominate the competition, this is the reason for urf being one of, if not, the most asked for modes. With these nerfs and balance changes, you’re making an attempt to change it into a less chaotic mode. You need to understand that the mode is fun BECAUSE of this strength that players have with certain picks. Would love to see URF continue as a mode full of chaos and players getting a chance to truly, rapid fire cast their abilities.

yes I agree with this. Though I also understand why riot doesn't want to bring back old urf. However, I do want to see an iteration of urf where it is not all random. Maybe chaos urf where you start the game at level 6 with 5k gold and you get a increased gold per minute but no gold on champion kills thus decreasing the punishment for feeding, decreasing the game length and decreasing the amount people will get salty at the game mode while still giving people choice of what champ they want to play. Just a thought

{{champion:82}}  any thoughts on my man. 

Or is no one playing him at all.

I haven't had the option yet.

But i can imagine   it  not being fun. Since everyone outranges him and the game mode actively fucks his sustain.
He's awful in URF, but they better buff things like Irelia who are already too strong in this mode. People are sleeping on AP Irelia
Seems like Riot has blinders on when it comes to Urf and Morde.

I just had a morde in our last game vs a ryze and fiddle on the enemy team and a MF and he won the game for us.

The elder drags can be ghosted and he just busted in through their front gate.

could you guys please reduce the impact of taking the elder drake? its currently game over if one team gets the first drake. the fun is over when either team gets drake. i would like to see either the true dmg DOT from elder being removed or the true dmg to objectives/towers being decreased or removed. taking a 2nd drake when u have one already is too easy currently.
Just a small question, Why is there an ARURF change/feedback thread out yet when nexus blitz was out 2nd time there wasn't one for entire span that the game mode running?
Maybe because Urfs been around for like  6 years?

Riot tends to toss out a changelist if a game mode hasn't been available in a while to serve as a refresher. Maybe they didn't think that was necessary for Blitz's second run.

A more significant question would be why have temporary modes like ARURF and Nexus Blitz gotten more balance changes in a month than permanent modes like Twisted Treeline and ARAM have gotten in a year?
I mean have you seen twisted though? i mean like i waited 10 minutes for a match once XD

Have you seen TT ever get the amount of dev attention that ARURF/Blitz have? It's both a self-fulfilling prophecy and a vicious cycle to neglect a game mode because you expect it to be less popular, and then justify the neglect by the fact that the game mode is less popular. Players complain about Summoner's Rift feeling stale if the meta doesn't change for a few weeks/months. Meanwhile Twisted Treeline is somehow supposed to be fine when the meta hasn't really shifted in years.
How random is All Random. I seem to be getting the same champions over and over again and seeing the same champions in games over and over again.
People reroll and tend to pick what's strong. You'll see more Lux than say Zac because one of them is more abusable in URF than the other.
I think the Jax e really needs to be looked at. Even the person playing him admitted it was broken.
please do something about garen he is literally a monster <3

So i have some tips to make urf more enjoyable since i dont hear much good from it. The first one is to don't try to balance a fun gamemode and don't make it random, since most of the players are waiting for that 1 champ for 40-50-60 games to play it and they won't even enjoy that since the enemy is that much stronger or weaker. The second one is removing the baron/dragon, or give them something like baron buff is that your minions will permanently spam emotes and dragon is that your minion does some kind of taunt if they kill an enemy or something like that, be creative with that.The 3rd one is that you should add revive with like 80-100 second cooldown, since one of the worst thing in the game is waiting on the grey screen, so people would find more fun in it,and maybe reduce death timers.The next summoner spell which should be added is Clairvoyance since it helps things like lux r ezreal r sniping etc... i think thats about it, i hope you consider trying this out or just think about it, do a vote in the client or something. 

if you think this is a good idea, then upvote it, i would appreciate it.


(a bonus, if you want to make ap ezreal good again, then give ap jg item back its s5 form so it would have a bit of waveclear, nerf this double tear build somehow, either don't allow to stack 2, or something, and then both ap mid ezreal and ad ezreal would be good. since i love ap ezreal, but now there is no way to play it right now, maybe in jungle, but thats not so good either. if he had some waveclear then it would be good, and it would be special to have a smite midlaner who is such fun, but you must not play him on ranked, since he is not that great but can oneshot. also same goes to rengar give him back his old ferocity working so ap rengar would be playable again)


sorry for the bad english tho, but i think you can understand what i mean.

Base cannon still exists => I'm still not playing.

It's no fun playing a squishy champion when you can't siege towers for fear of a bruiser cannoning in behind you, so the only option is to kill them first. I liked URF because it was SR on steroids; this mode is just fighting with no strategy.

I mean i much prefer the base cannon. Quite a few games, the first fight before minions spawned lasted for 3 minutes because people would die and come back up and get there so easy to continue the fight. Everyone just died and got items then rejoined the fight. It made it much more fun and fast paced. And most of the squishy champions would succeed the best because they have poke or low cd mobility. If a bruiser cannons in behind you, you most likely have the means to cc chain them to the ground or enough to run away. The cannon adds massive strategy and enables people to make some really good (and bad!) cannon plays. It enables you to have another sumoner spell instead of tp. {{sticker:galio-happy}}
{{champion:13}} 's shield or root need addressed. With low ping he shreds any nonranged character without counterplay and wins any ranged battle with a constantly refreshing shield.

Is there a reason that certain champions are more common in ARURF? For a game with 130+ champions, I rarely see 130+ champions worth of variety. I understand that with trades and rerolls people are going to favor better champions, but the distribution still seems extremely off.
You answered the question yourself.
is there a reason for not letting us play ar urf in custom games?

Also thank you for the List. 
Really appreciated

I really like this balance style for gamemodes.

Simply changing Dmg/Reduction %'s is both easy to implement and easy to understand/remember for both devs and players.
It's a win win.
